title: Titans game plan for Bengals, Josh Allen vs Patrick Mahomes, Coaching updates, and Aaron Rodgers legacy on the line?
itunes:title: Titans game plan for Bengals, Josh Allen vs Patrick Mahomes, Coaching updates, and Aaron Rodgers legacy on the line?
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Super Bowl Champion Michael Robinson discuss how the Titans can avoid being upset by the Bengals. Michael thinks Derrick Henry will be a factor with how it affects the Titans game plan. We ask which players have to be dominant this weekend while taking a closer look at Matt Stafford's ability to get past the Buccaneers. Bills and Chiefs is a matchup of two star QB's and will set the stage for years to come in the AFC. After some coaching updates we turn to the NFC looking at the 49ers chances against the Packers. Peter thinks Kyle Shanahan's familiarity with the Packers is going to help San Fran while Michael thinks Aaron Rodgers has some legacy points on the line in this game.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
